title: Mellisaiye Song Lyrics Mr Romeo
stanzas:
mellisaiye en
idhayathin mellisaiye
en uravukku innisaiye
en uyir thodum
nallisaiye (2)

kannai konjam thirandhen
kangalukkul vizhundhaai
yenathu vizhigalai moodi konden

unnai chirai yeduthen (2)

mellisaiye en
idhayathin mellisaiye
en uravukku innisaiye
en uyir thodum
nallisaiye

ethanai nilavai
unakkaaga veruthirudhen
uyir sumandhu poruthirundhen
unai kandu uyir thelindhen

nee oru padhi endrum
naan oru padhi
kadhal jothi

kannai konjam thirandhen
kangalukkul vizhundhaai
yenathu vizhigalai moodi konden
sinnanjiru kangalil
unnai chirai yeduthen (2)

manmadha vidhaiyai
manathodu vidhaithadhu yaar
mazhai oottri valarthadhu yar
malar kaadu parithadhu yar

kadhal theeyai
nei kondu valarthadhu yaar
kai kondu maraithadhu yaar
athai vandhu anaippathu yaar

kangalukkul vizhunthai
yenathu vizhigalai moodi konden
sinnanjiru kangalil unnai chirai yeduthen
